q: What warranties come with flood-barrier systems?
a: Standard coverage: 10-year structural frame, 3-year hardware, 1-year seals. Optional extended plans cover maintenance and resealing. See maintenance guide.
Improper installation, unauthorized repairs, and missed annual inspections. Always keep your maintenance log current.

q: How do I file a warranty claim?
a: Submit serial number, install date, and photos. Most claims resolved within 10 business days.

q: Can warranties transfer to new homeowners?
a: Yes—upon inspection and documentation transfer. Adds value at resale; see home value impact.

q: Are labor and parts both covered?
a: Yes during warranty period. Extended plans include on-site labor for gasket or hardware replacement.

q: Do motorized systems have separate warranties?
a: Yes—actuators and controllers 5 years. Electronics sealed against moisture per IP68 standard. See motorized flood barriers.
